name: Iron Ladies 2048
description: Iron Ladies 2048 merges classic gameplay pattern of 2048 and the cyberpunk setting. Collect points by creating tiles with larger numbers to make cyber-ladies strip down.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB RAM Storage: 540 MB available space
